name: The Echoing Lyre
description: An ancient instrument that seems to be playing a haunting melody all on its own. The strings seem to vibrate with an otherworldly energy, as if they are the key to unlocking the secrets of this forgotten library.

name: The Forgotten Quill
description: A quill pen lying abandoned on a nearby shelf, its nib stained with the ink of countless forgotten manuscripts. It seems to be calling out to you, inviting you to add your own chapter to the story of this labyrinthine library.
